name: Shivering Sheep
overview: The sheep in Australia have gone crazy! A breeding enhancers that scientists made have turned them all batty! Shoot them before they get you. An AMOS game created by Lee Hesselden and released as giftware, a type of shareware where you give a gift equal in value to the effort you believe went into the game and how much you valued it. Blast the ever speedier and sometimes smaller sheep before they get to your defensive line!
